Acid Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to acid, unlocking Poison Dart and Corrosive Spray.
Acid Infusion.name: Acid Infusion

Acid Spores.description:
Shoot spores of corrosive acid, dealing [X] Poison Damage.
Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Acid Spores.name: Acid Spores

Adrenaline.description:
Gain 2 Action Points immediately, but lose 2 Action Points next turn.
Any Action Points over your maximum are lost. Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking
Adrenaline.name: Adrenaline

All In.description:
Perform a heavy attack that deals [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
All In.name: All In

Apotheosis.description:
You take the first step towards godhood. The cost of all Source skills is reduced by -3 Source Point.
Set Apotheosis for 2 turn(s).
Apotheosis.name: Apotheosis

Apportation.description: Transport pickable items in the target area into your inventory.
Apportation.name: Apportation

Arcane Stitch.description:
Fully restore target character's Magic Armour
Restore [X] Magic Armour
Arcane Stitch.name: Arcane Stitch

Armour of Frost.description:
Ice forms a defensive barrier around the target, providing 8 Magic Armour. Cures Burning, Poisoned, Stunned, Frozen, Suffocating and Petrified.
Set Magic Shell for 3 turn(s).
Armour of Frost.name: Armour of Frost

Arrow Spray.description:
Fire 16 arrows in a 60 degree arc. Each arrow deals [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Arrow Spray.name: Arrow Spray

Arrow Storm.description:
16 arrows fall from the sky in the target area, dealing [X] physical damage
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Arrow Storm.name: Arrow Storm

Assassinate.description:
Attacking your target with meticulous aim, dealing [X] physical damage in one shot. When performed from stealth, this attack gains a 50% damage increase.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Assassinate.name: Assassinate

Backlash.description:
Jump over the enemy, landing behind their back and backstabbing them for [X] physical damage.
100% chance to BackstabDamage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse
Backlash.name: Backlash

Ballistic Shot.description:
A shot that deals [X] Physical damage and receives 5% bonus damage per 1m distance to target
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Ballistic Shot.name: Ballistic Shot

Barrage.description:
Fire three arrows at three targets of your choice, each dealing [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Barrage.name: Barrage

Battering Ram.description:
Rush forward in a straight line, to a designated point, hitting all enemies in your path for[X]physical damage and setting Knockdown.
Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Battering Ram.name: Battering Ram

Battle Stomp.description:
Smash your weapon into the ground, knocking down non-allied characters in front of you, and hitting them for [X] physical damage. Also clears non-cursed surfaces and clouds.
Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Battle Stomp.name: Battle Stomp

Black Shroud.description: Create a cloud of cursed smoke in an area, setting Suffocated and Blind on all characters within.
Black Shroud.name: Black Shroud

Bleed Fire.description:
Enemies will bleed fire when hit. Also creates a small fire area beneath each target and ignites surfaces in the area.
Set Bleed Fire for 3 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Bleed Fire.name: Bleed Fire

Bless.description:
Bless target character or surface.
Set Blessed for 2 turn(s).
Bless.name: Bless

Blessed Smoke Cloud.description: Conjure a cloud of thick blessed smoke that makes characters invisible.
Blessed Smoke Cloud.name: Blessed Smoke Cloud

Blinding Radiance.description:
Enemies around you receive [X] air damage. You receive a status that turns enemies in a 5m radius Blind.
Sets Blinding Radiance for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Blinding Radiance.name: Blinding Radiance

Blinding Squall.description:
A storm approaches and strong winds rise. They Blind and deal [X] air damage to characters in the target area.
Set Blinded for 1 turn(s).
Blinding Squall.name: Blinding Squall

Blitz Attack.description:
Jump from one target to another, hitting up to 2 targets, dealing [X] physical damage to each. Targets are chosen randomly in a 10m radius.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Blitz Attack.name: Blitz Attack

Blood Storm.description: The sky weeps bloody tears. Bolts of coagulated blood fall on enemy characters in the area, setting Disease and Decaying Touch. Turns all water in the area into blood.
Blood Storm.name: Blood Storm

Blood Sucker.description:
Target character consumes blood surfaces around them, restoring Vitality. The more blood, the more they are healed!
Restore up to 18 Vitality, depending on relevant surface area.
Blood Sucker.name: Blood Sucker

Bone Cage.description:
Increases Physical Armour by [X] and another [X] Physical Armour for each corpse in the area around you.
Set Bone Cage for 3 turn(s).
Bone Cage.name: Bone Cage

Bouncing Shield.description:
Throw your shield at an enemy dealing [X] physical damage. Shield can bounce to another enemy in 5m range.
Damage is based on the Physical Armour of your shield.
Bouncing Shield.name: Bouncing Shield

Break the Shackles.description: Remove the following negative status effects from yourself: Slowed, Crippled, Chilled, Shocked, Suffocating, Atrophy, Diseased, Infectiuos Diseased and Shackles of Pain.
Break the Shackles.name: Break the Shackles

Breathing Bubble.description:
Creates a bubble of clean air around your head, allowing you to ignore effects of cloud surfaces. Immune to suffocation.
Sets Breathing Bubble for 5 turn(s).
Breathing Bubble.name: Breathing Bubble

Bull Horns.description:
Magnificent horns sprout from your forehead, making you see red. You can rush at your enemies and gore them. Increases Retribution ability by 1 for the duration. Incompatible with Medusa Head.
Set Bull Horns for 4 turn(s).
Bull Horns.name: Bull Horns

Cannibalise.description:
Destroy an allied summon or totem. Receive half of their Vitality, Physical Armour and Magic Armour.
Instantly kills your target
Restore up to 50% of target's Vitality, Physical Armour and Magic Armour on caster.
Cannibalise.name: Cannibalise

Chain Lightning.description:
Shoot a stunning bolt of lightning that forks up to 8 times in a 8m radius and deals [X] Air Damage to each target.
Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence
Chain Lightning.name: Chain Lightning

Challenge.description:
Mark target enemy. If they die in the next 3 turns, you are healed and receive damage and armour bonuses. If target survives, their Vitality is healed to full and caster receives damage.
Apply Challenge to target, betting whether they will be dead in 3 turn(s).
Challenge.name: Challenge

Chameleon Cloak.description:
Grants you the ability to blend in with any enviroment as if invisible.
Set Invisiblefor 2 turn(s).
Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.
Chameleon Cloak.name: Chameleon Cloak

Chicken Claw.description:
Turn the target character into a chicken. Squawk!
Set Chicken Formfor 2 turn(s).
Chicken Claw.name: Chicken Claw

Chloroform.description:
Destroys [X] Magic Armour and then tries to set Sleeping.
Set Sleeping for 1 turn(s).Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Finesse.
Chloroform.name: Chloroform

Cleanse Wounds.description:
Heal target and create a water puddle beneath them. Remove Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, PoisonedandBleeding.
Restore X Vitality
Cleanse Wounds.name: Cleanse Wounds

Cloak and Dagger.description:
Teleport without breaking sneaking.
Does not break Invisibilty or Sneaking.
Cloak and Dagger.name: Cloak and Dagger

Closed Circuit.description:
Deals [X] Air Damage to enemies around you; then creates cursed static clouds on the edges of the spell.
Sets Air Immunity for 1 turn(s). Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s)
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence
Closed Circuit.name: Closed Circuit

Conjure Incarnate.description:
Conjure a personal elemental that matches the ground surface it's summoned onto. Your incarnate can be buffed with Infusions. Once you hit Summoning ability level of 10, a colossal Incarnate Champion will answer your summons!
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Conjure Incarnate.name: Conjure Incarnate

Contamination.description:
Deals [X] Poison Damage to enemies and undead allies around you and can poison them. Turns water, blood surfaces and clouds in to poison!
Set Poisoned for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Contamination.name: Contamination

Corpse Explosion.description:
Explode the target corpse, dealing physical damage in the area
Blows up your target.
Corpse Explosion.name: Corpse Explosion

Corrosive Spray.description:
Destroy [X] Physical Armour on targets in a cone, and set Acid and Atrophy.
Set Acid for 2 turn(s).Set Atrophy for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Corrosive Spray.name: Corrosive Spray

Corrosive Touch.description:
Destroy [X] Physical Armour on target character, and set Acid status.
Set Acid for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Corrosive Touch.name: Corrosive Touch

Corrupted Blade.description:
Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Decay and Diseased.
Set Decaying for 2 turn(s).Set Diseased for 2 turn(s).Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Corrupted Blade.name: Corrupted Blade

Crippling Blow.description:
Cripple the target with a sweeping blow, and all characters around it. Deals [X] physical damage.
Set Crippled for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Crippling Blow.name: Crippling Blow

Cryogenic Stasis.description:
Target ally becomes immune to all damage, and heals over time.
Set Permafrost for 1 Turn(s)
Cryogenic Stasis.name: Cryogenic Stasis

Cryotherapy.description:
Consume Frozen surfaces around you and convert them to Magic Armour.
Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.
Cryotherapy.name: Cryotherapy

Curse.description:
Curse target character or surface.
Set Cursed for 2 turn(s).
Curse.name: Curse

Cursed Electric Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to cursed electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge and Closed Circuit.
Cursed Electric Infusion.name: Cursed Electric Infusion

Daggers Drawn.description:
Whirl into a barrage of 5 stabs, each dealing [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Daggers Drawn.name: Daggers Drawn

Dazing Bolt.description:
An electrical bolt falls from the sky, dealing [X] Air Damage to characters and items in the area, and setting Shocked status.
Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Dazing Bolt.name: Dazing Bolt

Death Wish.description:
Target character receives a damage bonus equal to the percentage of their lost Vitality. For example, a character with 30% Vitality will gain a 70% damage bonus. However, they also receive [X] piercing damage each turn!
Set Death Wish for 2 turn(s).
Death Wish.name: Death Wish

Decaying Touch.description:
Deal phyiscal damage to target character. Sets Decay, so the target will take piercing damage from healing spells and potions.
Set Decaying for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Decaying Touch.name: Decaying Touch

Deep Freeze.description:
Targets in the cone that are frozen and under 20% Vitality shatter and instantly die. Otherwise they receive [X] Water Damage and become Frozen.
Instantly kill targets with Frozen status below 10% Vitality.Set Frozen for 1 Turn(s)
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Deep Freeze.name: Deep Freeze

Deflective Barrier.description:
Projectiles that hit you are reflected back at the caster. This does not prevent the original projectile effects. Provides7 Physical Armour.
Set Deflecting for 3 turn(s).
Deflective Barrier.name: Deflective Barrier

Demonic Stare.description:
Drain [X] Magic Armour from target character and gain that amount yourself.
Restore up to 8 Magic Armour depending on damage tha will deal.
Demonic Stare.name: Demonic Stare

Deploy Mass Traps.description: Throw 4 explosive traps at target locations. Each trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.
Deploy Mass Traps.name: Deploy Mass Traps

Dimensional bolt.description:
Shoot a volatile bolt that deals [X] of a random type, and then creates a corresponding surface
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Dimensional bolt.name: Dimensional bolt

Dome of Protection.description:
Create a magical field that restores Magic and Physical Armour and increases elemental resistances on allies in the area.
Restore Physical Armour + Magical Armour
Dome of Protection.name: Dome of Protection

Dominate Mind.description:
Charm target non-allied character, causing them to join your side in combat for the duration of the status.
Set Charmed for 2 turn(s).
Dominate Mind.name: Dominate Mind

Door to Eternity.description:
Give all summons around you a status that prevents them from dying to damage or disappearing when their life runs out.
Set Persisting for 2 turn(s).
Door to Eternity.name: Door to Eternity

Dragon's Blaze.description:
Breathe flames in a cone, dealing [X] fire damage and leaving fire surface behind.
Set Burning for 2 turn(s).
Dragon's Blaze.name: Dragon's Blaze

Dust Blast.description:
Throw dust at all enemies in range, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage.
Set Blinded for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Dust Blast.name: Dust Blast

Earthquake.description:
Deals [X] Earth Damage and Knockdown enemy characters and items around you. Creates 8 random oil surfaces within the area
Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Earthquake.name: Earthquake

Electric Discharge.description:
An electrical jolt deals air damage to target character. Sets status Shocked.
Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Electric Discharge.name: Electric Discharge

Electric Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to electricity, unlocking Electric Discharge.
Electric Infusion.name: Electric Infusion

Elemental Arrowheads.description: Target a surface in melee radius. For one turn, elemental damage matching that surface is added to your ranged weapon attacks and ranged weapon-based skills.
Elemental Arrowheads.name: Elemental Arrowheads

Elemental Totem.description:
Target a ground surface and conjure a totem of the corresponding element. Each turn, this totem will fire a projectile at enemies in sight.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Elemental Totem.name: Elemental Totem

Encourage.description:
Encourage allies around you, increasing their primary attributes.
Set Enouraged for 3 turn(s).
Encourage.name: Encourage

Enrage.description:
Motivate an allied character with the power of rage. Target allied character is garaunteed to land critical hits with basic attacks and weapon skills, but is muted. Clears Taunted, Terrified, Charmed, Mad and Clear-Minded statuses.
Set Enraged for 1 turn(s).
Enrage.name: Enrage

Epidemic of Fire.description:
Fire a cursed flame that will fork on impact up to 5 times, dealing [X] Fire Damage and leaving a cursed fire surface in its wake.
Set Necrofire for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Epidemic of Fire.name: Epidemic of Fire

Equalise.description: Vitality and Armour percentages of characters in target area are summed up and redistributed equally.
Equalise.name: Equalise

Erratic Wisp.description:
Cause target character to teleport in a random direction each time they are attacked. Increases Air Resistance by 40%
Sets Erratic Wisp for 2 turn(s).
Erratic Wisp.name: Erratic Wisp

Ethereal Storm.description: Unpredictable projectiles from distant planes strike target area, dealing random elemental damage to enemies or healing allies.
Ethereal Storm.name: Ethereal Storm

Evasive Aura.description:
Your dodging is increased by 90% and your Movement Speed is increased by 1m.
Sets Evasive Aura for 1 turn(s).
Evasive Aura.name: Evasive Aura

Fan of Knives.description:
Fling a dagger at every enemy around you, dealing [X] physical damage. Can backstab!
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Fan of Knives.name: Fan of Knives

Farsight.description:
Increase the range of a targeted character's ranged attacks and skills by 3m.
Set Farsight for 3 Turn(s).
Farsight.name: Farsight

Farsight Infusion.description:
Unlock a ranged attack for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Magic Armour (amount depends on your level)
Set Farsight Infusion.
Farsight Infusion.name: Farsight Infusion

Favourable Wind.description:
Control the forces of nature so the wind is literally at your party's back. An aura increases you allies' movement speeds while they stay close to you.
Sets Favourable Winds Aura for 3 turn(s).
Favourable Wind.name: Favourable Wind

Fire Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element tofire, unlocking Fireball.
Fire Infusion.name: Fire Infusion

Fire Whip.description:
Long-range attack that deals [X] Fire Damage to a single target, leaving them blind and burning.
Set Burning for 1 Turn(s).Set Blinded for 1 Turn(s)
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Fire Whip.name: Fire Whip

Fireball.description:
Hurl a fiery sphere that will explode, dealing [X] Fire Damage.
Set Burning for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Fireball.name: Fireball

Firebrand.description:
An aura that adds [X] Fire Damage for weapon skills and attacks for all allies near you.
Set Firebrand for 2 turn(s).
Firebrand.name: Firebrand

First Aid.description:
Heals target for 8 Vitality. Cures Crippled, Knocked Down, Blind, Silence, Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned, Diseased.
Restore 8 Vitality.
Set Rested for 1 turn(s).
First Aid.name: First Aid

Flaming Crescendo.description:
Curse the target to explode in 3 turns or on death.
Set Flaming Crescendo for 3 turn(s).
Flaming Crescendo.name: Flaming Crescendo

Flaming Skin.description:
You get immunity to fire, but lowered resistance to water. You bleed fire.
Set Flaming Skin for 2 turn(s).
Flaming Skin.name: Flaming Skin

Flaming Tongues.description:
Flaming tongues protect you, immediately attacking approaching enemies.
Set Flaming Tongues for 3 turn(s).
Flaming Tongues.name: Flaming Tongues

Flay Skin.description:
Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Set status that halves resistances.
Set Nullified Resistance for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.
Flay Skin.name: Flay Skin

Flesh Sacrifice.description:
Gain 1 Action Point immediately and a 10% damage boost for 2 turns at the cost of -1 Constitution. Any Action Points over your maximum are lost.
Set Flesh Sacrificefor 2 turn(s).
Flesh Sacrifice.name: Flesh Sacrifice

Flurry.description:
Peform 3 quick attacks, dealing [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from the Attribute of your Weapon. Requires a Melee Weapon
Flurry.name: Flurry

Forced Exchange.description:
Exchange Vitality percentages with target character.
Exchange vitality percentages with target character.
Forced Exchange.name: Forced Exchange

Fortify.description:
Provides 7 Physical Armour. While Fortified, the target cannot be teleported. Removes Poisoned, Bleeding, Burning, Acid, Decaying.
Set Fortified for 3 turn(s).
Fortify.name: Fortify

Fossil Strike.description:
A giant rock with sticky oil that deals [X] Earth Damage. Creates an oil surface where it lands.
Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Fossil Strike.name: Fossil Strike

Gag Order.description:
Destroy [X] Magic Armour on target character. Silence target.
Set Silenced for 1 turnDamage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Gag Order.name: Gag Order

Glitter Dust.description:
Target is marked, reducing its ability to dodge. Prevents target from going invisible.
Set Marked for 3 turn(s).
Glitter Dust.name: Glitter Dust

Global Cooling.description:
Set Chilled on enemies around you and deal [X] Water Damage. Freeze all succeptible surfaces.
Set Chilled for 3 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Global Cooling.name: Global Cooling

Grasp Of The Starved.description:
Undead hands rise from underground, attacking characters that stand in blood surfaces and clouds. Deals [X] physical damage to each character and sets Crippled.
Set Crippled for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Grasp Of The Starved.name: Grasp Of The Starved

Guardian Angel.description:
Allies in melee range redirect 50% of received damage to you.
Set Guardian Angel Aura for 2 turn(s).
Guardian Angel.name: Guardian Angel

Hail Storm.description:
20 ice shards fall from the sky, each dealing [X] Water Damage to characters within 13m range from impact.
Set Chilled for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Hail Storm.name: Hail Storm

Hail Strike.description:
Icicles fall from the sky, chilling enemies and dealing water damage. They create ice surfaces where they hit the ground.
Set Chilled for 2 turn(s).
Damages is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Hail Strike.name: Hail Strike

Haste.description:
Sets Hasted on target character. Hasted increases movement speed by 2m per AP and gives an additional 1 AP per turn. Clears Slowed and Crippled.
Set Hasted for 2 turn(s).
Haste.name: Haste

Healing Ritual.description:
Shoot a bolt of healing energy that will jump to nearby allies.
Restore 7 Vitality
Healing Ritual.name: Healing Ritual

Healing Tears.description:
Three healing tears circle around you. Everytime an ally walks into melee range near you, a healing tear bathes them.
Set Healing Tears for 3 Turn(s)
Healing Tears.name: Healing Tears

Heart of Steel.description:
Your heart pumps liquid metal, creating a robust layer of Physical Armor. This regenerates each turn.
Restore 3 Physical Armour for 4 turn(s).
Heart of Steel.name: Heart of Steel

Ice Fan.description:
Target 3 positions and shoot an ice shard at each one, dealing [X] Water Damage and making targets Chilled.
Set Chilled for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Ice Fan.name: Ice Fan

Ice Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to blessed ice, unlocking Restoration and Healing Ritual.
Ice Infusion.name: Ice Infusion

Icy Skin.description:
You get immunity to water, but lowered resistance to fire. You bleed ice.
Set Icy Skin for 2 turn(s).
Icy Skin.name: Icy Skin

Ignition.description:
Sets enemy characters around you on fire. Deals [X] fire damage to each. Ignites all susceptible surfaces.
Set Buring for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Ignition.name: Ignition

Impalement.description:
Spikes impale all characters and items, setting Crippled and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Also creates an oil puddle.
Set Crippled for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Impalement.name: Impalement

Infect.description:
Deal [X] phyiscal damage.Infect a target with a disease that will spread to other nearby characters. Diseased characters deal reduced damage with all attacks and have lowered Constitution.
Set Infected for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Infect.name: Infect

Infectious Flame.description:
Send a cursed flame that will split on impact up to five times, dealingX-Y fire damage and leaving a cursed fire surface behind
Set Burning for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Infectious Flame.name: Infectious Flame

Jellyfish Skin.description:
Bleed electrified water. You get immunity to electricity, but lowered resistance to poison and earth damage.
Set Jellyfish Skin for 2 turn(s).
Jellyfish Skin.name: Jellyfish Skin

Laser Ray.description:
Line of intese heat that deals [X] Fire Damage to characters and leaves fire clouds behind.
Set Burning for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Laser Ray.name: Laser Ray

Last Rites.description:
Sacrifice yourself to bring an ally back to life. Deals [X] piercing damage to you, and resurrects target character with maximum Vitality.
Set Potion.
Last Rites.name: Last Rites

Living Wall.description: Vines sprout from the ground to block the path in the target area, emitting poison clouds around them.
Living Wall.name: Living Wall

Living on the Edge.description:
For 2 turns your character's Vitality cannot be reduced below 1 point, keeping them alive against all odds. If the target is a summon, their lifetime will be prolonged for the duration.
Set Death Resist for 2 turn(s).
Living on the Edge.name: Living on the Edge

Maddening Song.description:
Sing, causing characters in your target area to become Mad. Maddened characters will attack those nearest them, regardless of alignment.
Set Mad for 1 turn(s).
Maddening Song.name: Maddening Song

Marksman's Fang.description:
Shoot an arrow that goes straight through enemies. Each enemy that's hit takes [X] piercing damage, ignoring armour.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Marksman's Fang.name: Marksman's Fang

Mass Breathing Bubbles.description:
Set Breathing Bubbles on allieas around you, allowing them to ignore effects of cloud surfaces and making them immune to suffocation.
Sets Mass Breathing Bubbles for 5 turn(s).
Mass Breathing Bubbles.name: Mass Breathing Bubbles

Mass Cleanse Wounds.description:
Heal yourself and allies around you. Create a water puddle beneath every target. Remove Necrofire, Burning, Diseased, Decaying Touch, Poisoned, Bleeding, Suffocation and Acid.
Restore 15 Vitality
Mass Cleanse Wounds.name: Mass Cleanse Wounds

Mass Corpse Explosion.description:
Explode all corpses around you, dealing physical damage in the area
Blows up your target.
Mass Corpse Explosion.name: Mass Corpse Explosion

Mass Cryotherapy.description:
Each ally consumes Frozen surfaces around them, converting the frozen surfaces to Magic Armour.
Restore up to 34 Magic Armour depending on relevant surface area.
Mass Cryotherapy.name: Mass Cryotherapy

Mass Oily Carapace.description:
Each ally consumes oil surfaces around them, converting the oil surfaces to Physical Armour.
Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.
Mass Oily Carapace.name: Mass Oily Carapace

Mass Sabotage.description:
Explode two random grenades or arrows in the inventories of any enemy in a target circle.
Explodes 2 random Arrow(s) or Grenade(s) on target's inventory.
Mass Sabotage.name: Mass Sabotage

Master of Sparks.description:
Target character and surrounding allies receive Sparkmaster status that adds a chance of fiery sparks to melee attacks.
Set Sparkmaster for 2 turn(s).
Master of Sparks.name: Master of Sparks

Medusa Head.description:
Snakes grow out of your head, giving you a petrifying aura and the Petrifying Visage skill. Incompatible with Bull Horns.
Set Medusa Head for 2 turn(s).
Medusa Head.name: Medusa Head

Mend Metal.description:
Allies near you start slowly regenerating Physical Armour.
Restore 3 Physical Armour for 3 turn(s).
Mend Metal.name: Mend Metal

Meteor Shower.description:
25 fireballs come crashing from the sky. Each does [X] Fire Damage within a 3m range from impact.
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Meteor Shower.name: Meteor Shower

Mortal Blow.description:
Deal [X] physical damage. Damage is doubled if you are sneaking or invisible. Target is killed instantly if below 20% Vitality.
Instantly kill target below 20% Vitality.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Mortal Blow.name: Mortal Blow

Mosquito Swarm.description:
Unleash a swarm of giant mosquitos to suck the blood from your enemies, dealing physical damage and healing yourself.
Restore up to 9 Vitality, depending on the damage dealt.Set Bleeding for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence.
Mosquito Swarm.name: Mosquito Swarm

Necrofire Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to necrofire, unlocking Fireball and Epidemic of Fire.
Necrofire Infusion.name: Necrofire Infusion

Nether Swap.description:
Make two characters switch places. One of the characters can be you.
Sets Nether Swap for 1 turn(s).
Nether Swap.name: Nether Swap

Oily Carapace.description:
Consume oil surfaces around you and convert them to Physical Armour.
Restore up to 34 Physical Armour, depending on relevant surface area.
Oily Carapace.name: Oily Carapace

Onslaught.description:
Attack five times with astonishing speed, each hit dealing [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Onslaught.name: Onslaught

Overpower.description:
Deals [X] physical damage. If your Physical Armour is higher than your opponent's, destroy all their Physical Armour. Can set Knocked Down.
Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Strength.
Overpower.name: Overpower

Peace of Mind.description:
Target gains Clear-Minded, which increases Strength, Finesse, Intelligence and Wits by 1. Removes Blinded, Terrified, Charmed, Taunted, Sleeping, Enraged and Mad.
Set Clear-Minded for 3 turn(s).
Peace of Mind.name: Peace of Mind

Petrifying Touch.description:
Turn a nearby target to stone, incipacitating it. Deal [X] earth damage. Removes Bleeding, Burning, Poisoned and Crippled.
Set Petrified for 1 turn(s).
Petrifying Touch.name: Petrifying Touch

Phoenix Dive.description: Leap through the air to a target position, creating a fire surface upon landing.
Phoenix Dive.name: Phoenix Dive

Pin Down.description:
Deal [X] physical damage and Cripple target character.
Set Crippled for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Pin Down.name: Pin Down

Planar Gateway.description: Conjure two linked gateways that allow any character to instantly travel between them.
Planar Gateway.name: Planar Gateway

Play Dead.description:
Fool enemies into thinking you're dead. Cooldown of skills will be paused. Any action you take will cancel this status.
Set Playing Dead for 3 turn(s).Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.
Play Dead.name: Play Dead

Poison Dart.description:
Cast a magical poisonous dart that does [X] Poison Damage, and creates a puddle of poison.
Set Poisoned for 3 turn(s).
Damage is bases on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Poison Dart.name: Poison Dart

Poison Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to poison, unlocking Poison Dart.
Poison Infusion.name: Poison Infusion

Poison Wave.description:
Poison erupts from the caster in a circular wave, dealing [X] Poison Damage and forming poison clouds. Gives immunity to poison and earth damage for 1 turn
Set Earth Immunity for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Poison Wave.name: Poison Wave

Poisonous Skin.description:
You get immunity to poison and earth, but lowered resistance to air. You bleed poison.
Set Poisonous Skin for 2 turn(s).
Poisonous Skin.name: Poisonous Skin

Power Infusion.description:
Unlock Whirlwind and Rush for your Incarnate. Provides [X] Physical Armour (amount depends on your level).
Set Power Infusion.
Power Infusion.name: Power Infusion

Pressure Spike.description:
Condense all cloud surfaces in the area. Deals air damage to enemies and douses fire.
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Pressure Spike.name: Pressure Spike

Provoke.description:
Taunt the enemies around you. Provoke and tease them so that they want to atack you.
Set Taunted for 1 turn(s).
Provoke.name: Provoke

Purge.description:
Consume a corpse to gain a Source Point, or steal a Source Point from a living character.
Set Drain.
Purge.name: Purge

Pyroclastic Eruption.description:
Multiple oil-filled rocks erupt from the caster at all enemies in the area. On impact, they create oil surfaces and deal [X] Earth Damage.
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Pyroclastic Eruption.name: Pyroclastic Eruption

Rain.description:
Create a spreading water surface which douses fires. Set Wet status on characters in the area.
Set Wet for 1 turn(s).
Rain.name: Rain

Raining Blood.description:
Create blood surfaces. Set bleeding on enemies. Douse fire surfaces.
Set Bleeding for 2 turn(s).
Raining Blood.name: Raining Blood

Raise Bloated Corpse.description:
Targeta corpse to raise a bloated cadaver that fights for you. It can explode, dealing Physical Damage.
A bloated corpse will be summoned at the location of your target(s). Blows up your target.
Raise Bloated Corpse.name: Raise Bloated Corpse

Raise Bone Widow.description:
Raise a walking pile of bones which can consume corpses to restore Vitality and receive a stacking damage buff.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Raise Bone Widow.name: Raise Bone Widow

Rallying Cry.description:
Target character regenerates Vitality and Magic Armour according to the number of allied characters and totems in their vicinity.
Restore 4 Vitality. Restore 2 Magic Armour
Rallying Cry.name: Rallying Cry

Reactive Armour.description:
Deal [X] Physical Damage, based on your current Physical Armour, in a wave of metal spikes to everyone in the area (Including Yourself)
Damage is based on your current Physical Armour.
Reactive Armour.name: Reactive Armour

Reactive Shot.description:
Target a circular area. Until your next turn, you will reflexively shoot at the first three enemies moving within this area.
Set Reactive Shot for 1 Turn(s)
Reactive Shot.name: Reactive Shot

Restoration.description:
Restore Vitality of a target character. Restoration also cures Poisoned and Bleeding.
Restore 6 Vitality for 2 turn(s).
Restoration.name: Restoration

Ricochet.description:
Fire a normal arrow that deals physical damage and then finds another target within 5m. Forks up to 2 times.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Ricochet.name: Ricochet

Rupture Tendons.description:
Deal [X] physical damage to target character. When they try to move, they will take piercing damage.
Set Ruptured Tendons for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Rupture Tendons.name: Rupture Tendons

Sabotage.description:
If target character is carrying grenades or arrows, a random one explodes in their inventory.
Explodes 1 random Arrow(s) or Grenade(s) on target's inventory.
Sabotage.name: Sabotage

Sawtooth Knife.description:
Pierce the enemy's Physical Armour and directly deals [X] piercing damage. Sets Bleeding if enemy has no Physical Armour.
Set Bleeding for 3 turn(s).Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Sawtooth Knife.name: Sawtooth Knife

Searing Daggers.description:
Shoot 3 flaming daggers at targets of your choice, creating a fire surface and dealing [X] fire damage
Set Burning for two turns.Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Searing Daggers.name: Searing Daggers

Shackles of Pain.description:
Mark a target so that it will receive all of the damage you receive.
Set Shackles of Pain for 3 turn(s).
Shackles of Pain.name: Shackles of Pain

Shadow Infusion.description:
Incarnate learns how to go invisibleand strike foes with a corrosive slash.
Set Shadow Infusion.
Shadow Infusion.name: Shadow Infusion

Shields Up.description:
Restore the Physical Armour and Magic Armour of your shield
Restore Physical Armour Restore Magical Armour
Shields Up.name: Shields Up

Shocking Touch.description:
Sets the Shocked status on a target within arm's length and deals [X] Air Damage.
Sets Shocked for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Shocking Touch.name: Shocking Touch

Silencing Stare.description:
Silence enemies in a cone in front of you.
Set Silenced for 1 turn(s).
Silencing Stare.name: Silencing Stare

Siphon Poison.description:
Remove poison surfaces and clouds. Gain poison damage bonus to weapon attacks and weapon-based skills (dependent upon size of poison area cleared)
Set Siphon Poison for 2 turn(s).
Siphon Poison.name: Siphon Poison

Skin Graft.description:
Reset all cooldowns. Removes Burning, Necrofire, Poisoned and Bleeding.
Set Skin Graft
Skin Graft.name: Skin Graft

Sky Shot.description:
Leap into the air before shooting, gaining damage bonuses for your superior height. Deals [X] Physical Damage
This skill receives high ground bonuses regardless of elevation.Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Sky Shot.name: Sky Shot

Sleeping Arms.description:
Deal [X] physical damage and set Atrophy: your target can't use weapons or weapon skills anymore.
Set Atrophy for 2 turn(s).Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Sleeping Arms.name: Sleeping Arms

Smoke Cover.description: Create a smoke cloud around you, hiding from sight.
Smoke Cover.name: Smoke Cover

Soothing Cold.description:
Regenerate Magic Armour for all alies around caster.
Restore 8 Magic Armour for 3 turn(s).
Soothing Cold.name: Soothing Cold

Soul Mate.description:
Targetcharacter receives half of the healing and Armour restoration that you receive. Clears Frozen, Stunned, Knocked Down and Petrified.
Set Soul Mate for 2 turn(s).
Soul Mate.name: Soul Mate

Sparking Swings.description:
Receive Sparkstriker status. This causes your melee attacks to create a spark projectile that bounces off the initial target to hit the closest enemy.
Set Sparkstriker for 3 turn(s).
Sparking Swings.name: Sparking Swings

Spider Legs.description:
Spider legs burst from your back. You can create web surfaces in an area to entangle foes. Incompatible with Wings.
Set Spider Legs for 3 turn(s).
Spider Legs.name: Spider Legs

Spirit Form.description:
??
Set Invulnerablefor 2 turn(s).Set Silenced for 2 turn(s). Restore 6 Viality for 2 turn(s).
Spirit Form.name: Spirit Form

Spirit Vision.description:
Your eyes pierce the veil of the Hall of Echoes.
Set Spirit Visioned for 10 turn(s).
Spirit Vision.name: Spirit Vision

Spontaneous Combustion.description:
Deal [X] Fire Damage to target character. If the character is affected by Burning or Necrofire, remove those statuses and deal additional damage for each turn of duration remaining.
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from your Intelligence.
Spontaneous Combustion.name: Spontaneous Combustion

Spread Your Wings.description: Sprout temporary wings to fly when you move, allowing you to ignore ground surfaces. Incompatible with Spider Legs.
Spread Your Wings.name: Spread Your Wings

Staff of Magus.description:
Launch a magic missile from your staff that deals [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Staff of Magus.name: Staff of Magus

Steam Lance.description:
Releases a stream of Blessed Steam that heals characters in its path.
Restore 6 Vitality for 3 Turn(s)
Steam Lance.name: Steam Lance

Sucker Punch.description:
An unexpected blow, that deals [X] physical damage and knocks down target.
Set Knocked Down for 1 turn(s).
Sucker Punch.name: Sucker Punch

Summon Artillery Plant.description:
Plant can lob acidic spores and emit cursed poison clouds.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Artillery Plant.name: Summon Artillery Plant

Summon Cat Familiar.description:
Summon a black cat by your side.
The stats of the summon will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Cat Familiar.name: Summon Cat Familiar

Summon Condor.description:
Summons a condor that will aid you in combat.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Condor.name: Summon Condor

Summon Dragonling.description:
Summons a newt to help you in combat.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Dragonling.name: Summon Dragonling

Summon Fire Slug.description:
Summon a Fire Slug. Your Fire Slug can create fire surfaces and launch linear fire attacks.
The stats of the summon will depend on the caster's level and summoning ability.
Summon Fire Slug.name: Summon Fire Slug

Summon Ifan's Soul Wolf.description:
Summons your trusty Soul Wolf, which can Howl and Bite enemies.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Ifan's Soul Wolf.name: Summon Ifan's Soul Wolf

Summon Inner Demon.description:
Conjure a demon that will share their Intelligence with you and provide[X] Magic Armour. Grants you power to terrify and protect yourself with demonic fists.
Set Inner Demonfor 3 turn(s).
Summon Inner Demon.name: Summon Inner Demon

Summon Oily Blob.description:
Fling an Oil Blob at a target point, dealing [X] Earth Damage in the area. Oil Blob deals earth damage with melee attacks and leaves an oil puddle on death.
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Summon Oily Blob.name: Summon Oily Blob

Supercharger.description:
Target summon deals 50% more base damage during its next turn, but then it dies.
Set Supercharged for 2 turn(s).
Supercharger.name: Supercharger

Superconductor.description:
Shoot forking spikes at all enemies within the area, dealing [X] Air Damage and setting Shocked.
Sets Shocked for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Superconductor.name: Superconductor

Supernova.description:
Explode, creating fire surfaces and dealing [X] Fire Damage in a large area around you. (Except areas blocked by obstacles)
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Supernova.name: Supernova

Tactical Retreat.description:
Apply haste to yourself, then teleport away from imminent danger.
Set Hasted for 1 Turn(s)
Tactical Retreat.name: Tactical Retreat

Teleportation.description:
Teleport a target character or item to a point of your choosing
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Teleportation.name: Teleportation

Tentacle Lash.description:
Lash out at your opponent dealing, physical damage and setting Atrophy on them.
Set Atrophy for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Strength.
Tentacle Lash.name: Tentacle Lash

Terrain Transmutation.description: Target two circular areas. Swap surfaces and clouds.
Terrain Transmutation.name: Terrain Transmutation

Terrifying Cruelty.description:
Dagger attack that deals [X] physical damage and sets Bleeding and Fear on target character.
Set Bleeding for 3 turn(s).Set Terrified for 1 turn(s).Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse.
Terrifying Cruelty.name: Terrifying Cruelty

Thick of the fight.description:
The more the merrier! Gain a damage boost for every nearby character.
Set Thick of the Fight for 2 turn(s).
Thick of the fight.name: Thick of the fight

Throw Dust.description:
Throw dust at a character, blinding them and dealing [X] Earth Damage. Clears surfaces and clouds in the area.
Set Blinded for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Throw Dust.name: Throw Dust

Throw Explosive Trap.description: Throw an explosive trap at target locations. Trap takes a turn to activate. When active, trap will explode when a character approaches it.
Throw Explosive Trap.name: Throw Explosive Trap

Throwing Knife.description:
Throw a knife at your opponent, dealing [7-8] poison and [3-4] Air damage. Can backstab!
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from Finesse
Throwing Knife.name: Throwing Knife

Thunderstorm.description: A storm rages in the target area, hitting enemies with lightning bolts for 3 turns.
Thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm

Time Warp.description:
Target a character. Whenever this character ends a turn in combat, they immediately get a free turn.
Receive an extra turn in combat for 1 turn(s).
Time Warp.name: Time Warp

Tornado.description: A tornado moves randomly around the battlefield, removing surfaces and revealing invisible characters. Also clears Invisible, Burning and Slowed.
Tornado.name: Tornado

Totems of the Necromancer.description:
Spawn bone totems near every corpse in the area. Bone totems have ranged attacks that deal physical damage.
A Bones Totem will be summoned at the location of your target(s).
Totems of the Necromancer.name: Totems of the Necromancer

Turn to Oil.description: Turn water and blood surfaces into oil. Remove Stun and Shocked from characters.
Turn to Oil.name: Turn to Oil

Uncanny Evasion.description:
Your dodging is increased by 100% and your Movement Speed is increased by 20%.
Sets Evading for 1 turn(s).
Uncanny Evasion.name: Uncanny Evasion

Vacuum Aura.description:
Deal [X] Air Damage to enemies in the area. Caster receives an aura that sets Silence and Suffocating on enemies
Sets Vacuum Aura for 3 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from Intelligence
Vacuum Aura.name: Vacuum Aura

Vacuum Touch.description:
Deal [X] Air Damage. Set Suffocation and Silence on target
Sets Suffocating for 1 turn(s).Sets Silenced for 1 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence.
Vacuum Touch.name: Vacuum Touch

Vampiric Hunger.description:
Set Vampiric Hunger on target character, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Set Vampiric Hunger for 2 Turn(s)
Vampiric Hunger.name: Vampiric Hunger

Vampiric Hunger Aura.description:
Set Vampiric Hunger Aura on every ally around you, adding 50% Life Steal for 2 turns. Life Steal heals you in proportion to the damage you deal to Vitality.
Set Vampiric Hunger Aura for 2 Turn(s)
Vampiric Hunger Aura.name: Vampiric Hunger Aura

Vaporize.description: Remove Petrified and Frozen from target character. Vaporise ground surfaces into clouds. Does not work on Oil, Ice or Lava surfaces
Vaporize.name: Vaporize

Venom Coating.description:
Coat your weapon with poison, adding [X] Poison Damage to your weapon skills and attacks.
Set Venom Coating for 2 turn(s).
Venom Coating.name: Venom Coating

Venomous Aura.description:
Allies in range receive Venom Coating, which adds [X] Poison Damage to weapon skills and attacks.
Set Venomous Aura for 4 turn(s).
Venomous Aura.name: Venomous Aura

Warp Infusion.description:
Incarnate learns a teleport skill, and a skill to swap places with its master.
Set Warp Infusion.
Warp Infusion.name: Warp Infusion

Water Infusion.description: Change Incarnate's element to water, unlocking Restoration.
Water Infusion.name: Water Infusion

Whirlwind.description:
Perform a whirlwind attack, hitting enemies around you for [X] physical damage.
Damage is based on your basic attack and receives a bonus from stat of equipped weapon.
Whirlwind.name: Whirlwind

Wind-Up Toy.description:
Summon a mechanical bomber at the target point. The bomber can explode, dealing fire damage and producing a fire surface.
Does not break Invisibility or Sneaking.
The stats of the summons will depend on caster level and Summoning ability.
Wind-Up Toy.name: Wind-Up Toy

Winter Blast.description:
Deal [X] Water Damage and set Chilled status on characters in the area. Freeze blood and water surfaces.
Set Chilled for 2 Turn(s)
Damage is based on your level and receives a bonus from Intelligence
Winter Blast.name: Winter Blast

Worm Tremor.description:
Deals [X] Earth Damage to each character in the area. At your command, poisonous worms slither up from the earth, attaching to every character in the area who is not protected by Magic Armour. Affected characters cannot move or teleport, and they receive [X] Poison Damage each turn.
Set Entangled for 2 turn(s).
Damage is based on your level and receives bonus from your Intelligence.
Worm Tremor.name: Worm Tremor
